channel.title: Credit on Mryqu's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Credit on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: ArcGIS REST API资费
item.description: 一个ArcGIS开发者订阅每月有免费的50点积分。 GeoEnrichment API资费 在Esri GeoEnrichment Service提到了资费列表： | GeoEnrichment服务资费 | Esri积分 | 美元 | | - | - | - | | 1 Stored GeoEnrichment Variable | 0.01 积分 (Per Feature) | $0.001 (Per Feature) | | 1,000 Stored GeoEnrichment Variables | 10 积分 (Per Feature) | $1.00 (Per Feature) | | 1 Non-Stored GeoEnrichment Request | 0.01 积分 | $0.001 | | 1000 Non-Stored GeoEnrichment Requests | 10 积分 | $1.
